verbs.description: Trump [V: is] providing details for the first time about the history - making meeting between a sitting American president and the leader of North Korea over denuclearization .

[ARG0: Trump] is [V: providing] [ARG1: details for the first time] [C-ARG1: about the history - making meeting between a sitting American president and the leader of North Korea over denuclearization] .
Trump is providing details for the first time about the [ARG1: history] - [V: making] meeting between a sitting American president and the leader of North Korea over denuclearization .
Trump is providing details for the first time about the history - making meeting between a [V: sitting] [ARG1: American president] and the leader of North Korea over denuclearization .
